item.title: Wifi 802-11
item.description: In this document, we will discuss the actual Wi-Fi standard that we can find in the market. The initial slides consist of extensive lists of Wi-Fi technologies and their uses, such as Bluetooth network, Wi-Fi network, long-range Wi-Fi, and 3G network. However, they are currently out of service. Service Sets Basic Service Set There are various divisions within the service set, each of which provides certain types of service. In the basic service, we have things like SSID, which is the service set identifier that is broadcasted in the beacon as described in Mac Wifi.
